data.title: Sandersville Venue
data.meta_description: Ben J. Tarbutton Business Development Center For your keynote speakers, award ceremonies, live performances, and board meetings, OFTC has unique spaces for special events. Descriptions of Available Event Space Conference Rooms Flexible hall configurations Conference Center exhibit hall can be divided into two individual rooms A wide, spacious hallway is located on the north side […]
data.text:
Conference Rooms

Flexible hall configurations

Conference Center exhibit hall can be divided into two individual rooms

A wide, spacious hallway is located on the north side of the Conference Center to provide easy access to events and smooth traffic flow

Large equipment entrance and loading dock

Separate serving hallway connected to catering kitchen

State-of-the-art lighting, sound and wireless networking

Lobby/Foyer Area to Conference Rooms

Flexible, open space can hold up to 150 people

Atrium

Flexible, open space can seat up to 150 people

You will also find our Executive Boardroom just off the atrium to seat 15 people.

Thiele Auditorium

250 – seat auditorium features tiered seating

Ceiling mounted LCD projector for computer and DVD presentations

Wireless internet

Classroom

General purpose classrooms to accommodate 25 persons

Flexible seating arrangements (classroom, theater, U-shape, or boardroom style) customized for your group meetings

Rooms include built-in projection screens, tables with power outlets, and dry erase boards

Wireless internet access
